subject: Ethics
title: Auditing Algorithms
description: A quick win: understand Auditing Algorithms.

hook.text: You can inspect a bridge for cracks. But how do you inspect an algorithm that makes a million decisions a day?

buildup.text: Algorithm auditing tests AI systems for bias, errors, and unintended consequences before and after deployment.

discovery.text: Auditors feed the AI different inputsâ€”varying race, gender, ageâ€”to see if outcomes change unfairly.

twist.text: Most companies resist audits. They call their algorithms trade secrets and refuse outside scrutiny.

climax.text: New laws in NYC and the EU now require bias audits for hiring AI. Transparency is becoming mandatory.

punchline.text: You can't fix what you refuse to measure.

quiz.question: What is the purpose of an algorithm audit?
options: To test AI systems for bias and unintended harmful outcomes
